subject: [Radiance-general] Evalglare (WAS: Re:  rad to cad?)
body:
Hi Erik,

Short answer is you can use a non-hemispherical lens, as long as you take an eye illuminance reading as well. Still, if there are glare sources beyond the field of view of your lens, you're simply not going to get accurate results out of evalglare. I suggest you read up on the evalglare documentation, for starters?

- Rob
